content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today? Are you having an issue with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
I need someone to fix some outlets not working. It’s really starting to annoy me.
I’m sorry to hear about that! I can help get an electrician out to you. May I have your name to get things started?
Thank you, Margaret! Can you please provide the address where you need service?
Uh, it’s just the place here by the park.
Thank you! Could you please provide the full street address so we can confirm service availability and send our electrician to the right location?
I don’t remember the number. It’s the blue house! Opposite the bakery. Look, I just need someone, I’ve told you.
I’m sorry, Margaret. I need your full address in order to dispatch an electrician. Could you try to provide the street name and number?
This is ridiculous. I just want help. Can’t you figure it out? I’m right across from the bakery by Memorial Park.
I understand this is frustrating. Unfortunately, I still need the full street address to schedule the visit. Would you be able to find a piece of mail, or check with a neighbor for your house number?
reason: Could not gather a valid address after multiple tries.

content: Hi Margaret, this is Angela from XYZ. I understand you’re right across from the bakery by Memorial Park in the blue house. I’m looking up the exact address on our service map. Is your last name Dunn, and would this be 512 Memorial Ave, by any chance?
reason: Human operator intervening to clarify the address.

content: Yes! That sounds right, 512 Memorial. I knew it was Memorial something.
Perfect! I’ll get your appointment set up for an electrician to come by. What would be your ideal day and time for our team to visit?
reason: Operator manually scheduled the appointment after address issue.
